column4: I need some advice.  I am majorly new ti linux.   I have my broadcomm wireless found and loaded the driver using ndiswrapper, but it dosent show in the network area as a network device.  ANy input would be appreciated.  Im LOST!  lol
I wish I could help but I don't have a wireless card...have you searched the wiki page there is a howto for wireless users
GL and don't give up ... come back tomorrow if you need help :)
